label: Policy
comment: A plan of action agreed or chosen in order to obey rules or requests made by people in authority and designed to prevent and detect violations of applicable law, regulations, rules and ethical standards by employees, agents and others.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.

objectProperties.comment: A referenced standard applicable to this agricultural certificate.

referencedBy.comment: A compliance policy related to this sustainability assertion.
